alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 2:54PM EDT until July 09 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 253 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tallahassee Community College, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Monticello, Florida State University, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Alma, Cody, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, Miccosukee, South City, Griffin Heights, Drifton, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Governors Square Mall and Midtown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
